table.name: Action
table.description: This table is a placeholder table which is used to establish a hierarchy between all action tables

table.name: Action_Patient_Comm
table.description: This table stores details of all communication actions between a patient and clinic

table.name: Action_Diagnosis
table.description: This table stores details of all actions where a physician makes a temporary or permanent diagnosis for a patient

column.name: diag_codetype_id
column.descr: The type of code that will be used to describe the diagnosis

column.name: diag_code
column.descr: The code describing the diagnosis pronounced by the physician

column.name: diagnosis
column.descr: The name of diagnosis pronounced by the physician (if the field above is left empty)

table.name: Action_Directive
table.description: This table stores details of all actions where a directive was issued by a patient or physician

column.name: issuer
column.descr: The person who issued this directive (if 'Other' chosen above)

column.name: reason
column.descr: The reason why this directive was issued

column.name: effective_begin_date
column.descr: The effective start date of the Insurance

column.name: referral_required
column.descr: Whether or not referral is required

column.name: sep_copay_xray
column.descr: Whether or not separate copay for X-ray

column.name: referral_or_precert
column.descr: Referral or Pre-Cert on Out Patient

column.name: ins_verified_by
column.descr: The ID of the person doing the Insurance verification

column.name: app_verified_by
column.descr: The ID of the person doing the Appointment verification

column.name: med_verified_by
column.descr: The ID of the person doing the Medical verification

column.name: per_verified_by
column.descr: The ID of the person doing the Personal verification

column.name: owner_org_id
column.descr: The organization which owns this record

table.name: Action_Provider_Comm
table.description: This table stores details of all communication actions between two physicians

table.name: Action_Procedure
table.description: This table stores details of all actions where a physician performs a procedure for a patient

column.name: proc_codetype_id
column.descr: The type of code that will be used to describe the procedure

column.name: proc_code
column.descr: The code describing the procedure performed by the physician

column.name: procedure
column.descr: The name of procedure performed by the physician (if the field above is left empty)

table.name: Action_Visit
table.description: This table stores details of all actions where a patient visited a physician

column.name: reason
column.descr: The reason why this visit took place
